item.title: Chrono Odyssey ‘Developer Interview #1: Building a World Beyond Time’
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/chrono-odyssey-developer-interview-1-building-a-world-beyond-time

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Featuring a first-look at in-game footage.

Publisher Kakao Games and developer Chrono Studio have released a 20-minute developer interview for Chrono Odyssey ahead of the game’s closed beta test in June, featuring a behind-the-scenes look at the development team’s vision and journey, and what sets the game apart from other massively multiplayer online RPGs.

The video features the following content:

  • A first look at in-game gameplay footage from Chrono Odyssey
  • The development vision and intent behind Chrono Odyssey
  • Key features and strengths of Chrono Odyssey
  • Introduction to Chrono Odyssey content
  • Goals and direction of the first global Closed Beta Test

Chrono Odyssey is planned for release across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

item.title: Game Boy – Nintendo Switch Online adds Gradius: Interstellar Assault, Kirby’s Star Stacker, Survival Kids, and The Sword of Hope
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/game-boy-nintendo-switch-online-adds-gradius-interstellar-assault-kirbys-star-stacker-survival-kids-and-the-sword-of-hope

  • Switch

Four new titles join the service.

The Game Boy – Nintendo Switch Online app has added Gradius: Interstellar Assault, Kirby’s Star Stacker, Survival Kids, and The Sword of Hope, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of each game, via the back of its box:

Gradius: Interstellar Assault

About

You’re cordially invited to the galaxy’s hottest cookout!

Smell the challenge, as the flames of destruction scorch your courage and ignite your fears. Just when you thought life was cool, the Bacterion Beast Squadron launches a massive counterattack that makes all other intergalactic battles seem like picnics. These plutonian chow hounds are starving for a victory. And if you’re not careful, they’ll char your hide, then serve you up like a stuffed Sarubian Space Pig!

Key Features

  • Two megs memory intensifies five unbelievable new levels of deep space devastation.
  • Pilot the galaxy’s most feared fighter, and out-blast hundreds of psychotic space freaks who’ll roast your tail with weapons unlike any you’ve ever encountered.
  • Unique duel scrolling battlefield speeds up the action and adds 3D effects to the carnage.
  • Select from three different pre-attack modes: Intruder Missiles, Laser Warfare, and Double Guns ‘A Blazing.
  • Capture Power-Up Spheres and increase your firepower with Ripple Blasts, Multiple Warheads, Ghost Fighters, and Force Fields.
  • Sharpen your tactics in “Practice Galaxy” where you can increase your odds of survival… slightly!

Kirby’s Star Stacker

About

Join Kirby as he stacks the falling stars with help from his friends, Rick, Kine and Coo. King Dedede is out to stop you! With a few quick moves and some well-timed strategy, you can quickly outwit him and move on to the next challenging level.

Kirby’s Star Stacker features pure puzzle fun for everyone. From above, blocks rain down constantly. From below, whole lines appear with unrelenting clock-like regularity. Simply sandwich the stars between Kirby’s pals and you’ll soon be on your way to the high score.

Key Features

  • Play the VS mode against a friend using the Game Link cable!
  • Four different games: Round Clear, VS, Challenge, and Time Attack!
  • Battery backed-up memory saves your progress!

Survival Kids

Uncover secrets about this mysterious Island. Hone your survival skills to get through the day. Improvise and create tools to hunt and protect. Think you’re old enough to live on your own. Now prove it.

The Sword of Hope

An evil sorcery blankets the land.

A monstrous dragon, having possessed the king, now rules behind an army of hideous creatures. You are the chosen one, the prince of destiny, who must save the true monarch and restore his kingdom.

Summon your courage and wit for the myriad challenges ahead. You must battle ogres, cyclopses and elusive skeletons.

Search for keys to the wizards’ gates that guard the invincible “Sword of Hope.” Free the sword and carry its magic to defeat the deadly dragon
Go now. It is time to master your fate.

item.title: RATSHAKER coming to PS5 on May 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/ratshaker-coming-to-ps5-on-may-28

  • PS5

First-person pest control simulator comes to console.

Publisher Dark Product and developer Sunscorched Studios will release first-person pest control simulator RATSHAKER for PlayStation 5 on May 28 for $3.49 / €3.49, the companies announced.

RATSHAKER first launched for PC via Steam on November 1, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dark Product:

About

Rebuilt from the nest up for consoles, RATSHAKER on PlayStation 5 uses the DualSense wireless controller’s gyroscope to deliver a hilariously immersive experience. For the first time ever, players can physically shake their controller to shake the rat—an absurd, satisfying mechanic brought to life with detailed motion input and hyper-reactive feedback.

What is RATSHAKER?

At its core, RATSHAKER is a satirical, physics-based first-person game about solving problems the old-fashioned way—by grabbing a rat and shaking the ever-loving squeak out of it. It’s weird. It’s dark. And somehow, it’s deeply cathartic.

PlayStation 5 Features

  • Gyro-Powered Pest Control – Shake your DualSense to physically control your in-game rat.
  • Hyper-Realistic RAT Physics – Every flail, flop, and squeal has been finely tuned for tactile feedback.
  • Effortless Pest Removal – Just grab, shake, and watch as your “problems” disappear.
  • Your rat responds to every shake… sometimes unexpectedly.
  • No Traps. No Mess. (Some Guilt.) – A clean conscience not included.

A Darkly Hilarious Journey

RATSHAKER is the fun and quirky solution to all your rat problems! Hold on to the RAT, shake your arm, and watch life’s problems disappear! How far can you go?

This is your chance to shake, rattle, and roll in the most ridiculous way possible—only on PlayStation.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater opening movie ‘Delta Version’
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/metal-gear-solid-delta-snake-eater-opening-movie-delta-version

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Kyle Cooper's opening sequence redone with new theme song by Cynthia Harrell.

Konami has released the opening movie for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, created by Kyle Cooper (Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty and Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater opening movie designer) with a new theme song performed by Cynthia Harrell.

Here is an overview of the game, via Konami:

About

The core experience of the original, evolved and more immersive than ever.

A remake of the 2004 game Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, with the same gripping story and engrossing world, now with all new graphics and 3D audio that enhance the jungle atmosphere. Get ready for the ultimate survival stealth action experience.

Key Features

  • Everything You Love, and More – The story, characters, voice acting, gameplay, and music that made the original a sensation return, remade for modern consoles. This evolutionary leap breathes new life into every cutscene, and rebuilds every corner of the world.
  • Authentic to Life Portrayals – The battle damage system has been upgraded, with the wear and tear of Snake’s clothes, as well as bruises and bullet wounds on his body, reflected in real time. Injuries will leave their mark on Snake’s body permanently, telling a story of each player’s unique journey through the game.
  • Deeply Immersive Experiences – Players can elect for a newly added, more modern control style. These intuitive controls let you focus entirely on the game, and the immersive thrills of the survival stealth experience. You can also choose to play with a classic control style that more closely recreates the feel of the original game.
  • Additional Game Modes
    • Snake vs. Monkey – In this mode, you’ll play as Snake, and round up all the escaped apes running amok in each stage! (A different special game will be implemented for the Xbox version! Please wait for further details.)
    • And more to come…

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on August 28.

Watch the opening movie below.
